text: mattu musa tam'ma janangakkagi nirannu bedidaga navu, ‘‘nim'ma urugolininda a bandege hodeyiri’’ endevu. Adarinda hanneradu cilumegalu horatavu. Ella janaru (ella gotradavaru) tavu niru padeyabekada sthalavannu gurutisikondaru – ‘‘allahanu enannu anugrahisiruvano adarinda unniri hagu kudiyiri mattu bhumiyalli asanti haraduvavaragi tirugabedi’’ (endu aga nimage adesisalagittu)
